title: Nirpathuve Nadapathuve Lyrics Bharathi
stanzas:
Nirpadhuve nadapadhuve
parapadhuve (2)
neengalellaam
sorpanamthaano
pala thotra mayakkangalo
sorpanamthaano
pala thotra mayakkangalo

karpadhuve kaetpadhuve
karudhuvadhe
neengal ellaam
arpamaai yeigalo
ummul aazhndha
porul illaiye
arpamaai yeigalo
ummul aazhndha
porul illaiye

Vaanagame ilaveiyle
maracherive
neengal ellaam
kaanalin neero
verum kaatchi pizhaithaano

ponathellaam kanavinai pol
udhainthelinthe ponathanaal
naanum or kanavo
indha niyazhmum poithaano

Kalamendre oru ninaivum
katchi endre pala ninaivum
kolamum poigalo
angu gunangalum poigalo (2)

kaanbathellaam maraiyum endraal
maraindhathellaam kaanbamandro
naanum or kanavo
indha niyazhmum poithaano
